title: How Microsoft wants to make its AI copilot more reliable
text: Bird does not deny that Microsoft is trying to use the additional security functions to contain problems that might not have existed without the development of its own AI systems. Reliable and reliable AI is therefore not a state, but a process that is derived from how people use AI, says the manager. “As users explore the enormous economic and creative potential of technology, there will always be those who do so inappropriately,” Bird said. “That’s why we’re creating appropriate security mechanisms to prevent this.” Also read: Are mobile AI assistants the next big thing?
